name: Supermarket Cashier Money Game
description:
Train to be a master cashier! Perfect your money handling skills by serving supermarket customers in time. Punch in the grocery item prices with precision and speed. Add up the customer's payment and enter it in then give them the right amount of change. Exercise your brain's sharpness by being fast at making change. The number of customers and groceries keep increasing but your time keeps shrinking. See if you can finish all 65 levels of Supermarket Cashier.
You can play in Timed Mode where you challenge your brain and cognition to complete the levels. Or you can play in Untimed Mode so you can play in a leisurely manner with rhythm and flow. This is the most realistic point of sales training game on the market.
